snippet.title: My Little Dictator - Visual Novel OP - "Battlefield of Love"
snippet.description:
My Little Dictator, 私の小さな独裁者 (Watashi no chīsana dokusai-sha), is a satirical dark-comedy parody of WW2, featuring genderbent anime dictators and generals! A ridiculous visual novel with turn-based battles, decision branches based on player choices, romance, drama and lots of fun things to play and unlock...

See the game on Steam at:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1882820/My_Little_Dictator/

=======================================
CREDITS
=======================================
OP Theme Song: 'Battlefield of Love'
Music and Lyrics: Matthew Myers (Leet Street Boys)
Vocals: Sneko
https://twitter.com/Snekoko
Produced by Leet Music
=======================================
Character Art: GreenTeaNeko
https://twitter.com/Green_Tea_Neko
Produced by Collateral Damage Studios
https://www.collateralds.com/
=======================================
Editing and video production: DesertFox
https://twitter.com/wargirlgames
My Little Dictator, brought to you by WarGirl Games
https://war-girl.com/
=======================================

© 2022 WarGirl Games, All Rights Reserved, My Little Dictator and all elements thereof

=======================================
STORY
=======================================
The world is on the brink of destruction. The treaties of the past have failed. Tensions brew as the Europa powers prepare themselves for war. The young dictators of the continent find themselves drawn into battle...

Yamato Yamamoto, a disillusioned but brave soldier from the Empire of Zipangu, is sent on a secret mission to spy on the Füühbar of Germania.

Can Yamato handle these deceptive, towering figures of history - the cruel Adorofia Hitora of Germania, the sly Gallia Cyrano of the Republic of Franzo, the bold Winstefina Churchill of the Empire of Britannia, the lazy Benita Mussorinni of the Empire of Vitalia, and the devilish Iosefina Starin of the Union of Sovia?

Will his mission be a success? Or will the world be plunged into further tyranny and darkness? The clock is ticking as the continent sleepwalks to its doom...

=======================================
FEATURES
=======================================
- A satirical dark-comedy parody of WW2, featuring genderbent anime dictators!
- Fight turn-based RPG battles using the latest tanks, weapons and elite forces!
- Make choices, fall in love! Capture the world and the hearts of girls!
- Watch the map change color as territories change hands! Play side missions and extra content! Fill up the Füühbarmuseum with stolen artifacts!
- Unlock and play an included prequel game, set on the other side of the world!

=======================================
Let's Plays Welcome! We'd love to hear from you at our official Twitter!

Guideline for Let's Plays and content creation here
https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1882820/view/3199256688965973017
=======================================
#mylittledictator #visualnovel #ww2 #anime
